controls.name: Disallow Changes to Encryption Configuration for Amazon S3 Buckets
controls.description: This control disallows changes to encryption for all Amazon S3 buckets. This is a preventive control with elective guidance. By default, this control is not enabled.

controls.name: Disallow Changes to Logging Configuration for Amazon S3 Buckets
controls.description: This control disallows changes to logging configuration for all Amazon S3 buckets. This is a preventive control with elective guidance. By default, this control is not enabled.

controls.name: Disallow Changes to Bucket Policy for Amazon S3 Buckets
controls.description: This control disallows changes to bucket policy for all Amazon S3 buckets. This is a preventive control with elective guidance. By default, this control is not enabled.

controls.name: Disallow Changes to Lifecycle Configuration for Amazon S3 Buckets
controls.description: This control disallows lifecycle configuration changes for all Amazon S3 buckets. This is a preventive control with elective guidance. By default, this control is not enabled.

controls.name: Detect Whether MFA is Enabled for AWS IAM Users
controls.description: This control detects whether MFA is enabled for AWS IAM users. You can protect your account by requiring MFA for all AWS users in the account.

controls.name: Detect Whether MFA is Enabled for AWS IAM Users of the AWS Console
controls.description: Protects your account by requiring MFA for all AWS IAM users in the console.

controls.name: Disallow Changes to Replication Configuration for Amazon S3 Buckets
controls.description: Prevents changes to the way your Amazon S3 buckets have been set up to handle replication within Regions or across Regions.

controls.name: Disallow Delete Actions on Amazon S3 Buckets Without MFA
controls.description: Protects your Amazon S3 buckets by requiring MFA for delete actions.

controls.name: Detect Whether Versioning for Amazon S3 Buckets is Enabled
controls.description: Detects whether your Amazon S3 buckets are enabled for versioning. This control does not change the status of the account.

controls.name: Detect whether any Amazon VPC subnets are assigned a public IP address
controls.description: This control detects whether Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (Amazon VPC) subnets are assigned a public IP address.

controls.name: Detect whether public IP addresses for Amazon EC2 autoscaling are enabled through launch configurations
controls.description: This control detects whether Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling groups have public IP addresses enabled through launch configurations.

controls.name: Disallow cross-region networking for Amazon EC2, Amazon CloudFront, and AWS Global Accelerator
controls.description: This control prevents configuring cross-region networking connections from Amazon EC2, Amazon CloudFront, and AWS Global Accelerator services. It prevents VPC peering and transit gateway peering.

controls.name: Disallow internet access for an Amazon VPC instance managed by a customer
controls.description: This control disallows internet access for an Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) instance managed by a customer, rather than by an AWS service.

controls.name: Disallow Amazon Virtual Private Network (VPN) connections
controls.description: This control prevents Virtual Private Network (VPN) connections (Site-to-Site VPN and Client VPN) to an Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC).

controls.name: Detect whether replication instances for AWS Database Migration Service are public
controls.description: This control detects whether AWS Database Migration Service replication instances are public.

controls.name: Detect whether Amazon EBS snapshots are restorable by all AWS accounts
controls.description: This control detects whether all AWS accounts have access to restore Amazon EBS snapshots.

controls.name: Detect whether any Amazon EC2 instance has an associated public IPv4 address
controls.description: This control detects whether an Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) instance has an associated public IPv4 address. This control applies only to IPv4 addresses.

controls.name: Detects whether an Amazon EKS endpoint is blocked from public access
controls.description: This control detects whether an Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS) endpoint is blocked from public access.

controls.name: Detect whether an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain is in Amazon VPC
controls.description: This control detects whether an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain is in Amazon VPC.

controls.name: Detect whether any Amazon EMR cluster master nodes have public IP addresses
controls.description: This control detects whether any Amazon EMR cluster master nodes have public IP addresses.

controls.name: Detect whether the AWS Lambda function policy attached to the Lambda resource blocks public access
controls.description: This control detects whether the AWS Lambda function policy attached to the Lambda resource blocks public access.

controls.name: Detect whether public routes exist in the route table for an Internet Gateway (IGW)
controls.description: This control detects whether public routes exist in the route table associated with an Internet Gateway (IGW).

controls.name: Detect whether Amazon Redshift clusters are blocked from public access
controls.description: This control detects whether Amazon Redshift clusters are blocked from public access..

controls.name: Detect whether Amazon S3 settings to block public access are set as true for the account
controls.description: This control periodically detects whether the required Amazon S3 settings to block public access are configured as true for the account, rather than for a bucket or an access point.

controls.name: Detect whether an Amazon SageMaker notebook instance allows direct internet access
controls.description: This control detects whether an Amazon SageMaker notebook instance allows direct internet access.

controls.name: Detect whether AWS Systems Manager documents owned by the account are public
controls.description: This control detects whether AWS Systems Manager documents owned by the account are public.

controls.name: Detect Whether Encryption is Enabled for Amazon EBS Volumes Attached to Amazon EC2 Instances
controls.description: This control detects whether the Amazon EBS volumes attached to an Amazon EC2 instance are encrypted.

controls.name: Detect Whether Amazon EBS Optimization is Enabled for Amazon EC2 Instances
controls.description: Detects whether Amazon EC2 instances are launched without an Amazon EBS volume that is optimized for performance.

controls.name: Detect Whether Amazon EBS Volumes are Attached to Amazon EC2 Instances
controls.description: This control detects whether an Amazon EBS volume device persists independently from an Amazon EC2 instance.

controls.name: Detect Whether Public Access to Amazon RDS Database Instances is Enabled
controls.description: Detects whether your Amazon RDS database instances allow public access. You can secure your Amazon RDS database instances by disallowing public access.

controls.name: Detect Whether Public Access to Amazon RDS Database Snapshots is Enabled
controls.description: Detects whether your Amazon RDS database snapshots have public access enabled. You can protect your information by disabling public access.

controls.name: Detect Whether Storage Encryption is Enabled for Amazon RDS Database Instances
controls.description: Detects Amazon RDS database instances that are not encrypted at rest.
